data.introduce: OI手工换开接口，支持代理人手工换开场景。
data.business: OI手工换开，支持单张客票换开和连续客票换开。
data.functions:
同黑屏指令OI功能，
1-单张客票换开
成人
OI:ET/999-1234567890#0034 PEK 01FEB3 08300014 P2
婴儿
OI:ET/IN/999-1234512345#0034 PEK 01FEB3 08300014 P2
示例解释: 
ET                  电子客票换开标识,固定格式
IN                  婴儿标识
999-1234567890      原始票号 
#0034               票号对应的航段序号
PEK                 原出票城市 
01FEB3              原客票出票日期,年份要输入个位数
08300014            原出票OFFICE的航协号 
P2                  指定旅客
2-连续客票换开 
OI:ET/999-1234567890-91#00341200 SHA 17AUG3 08301101 P1
示例解释:
999-1234567890-91   连续客票票号,第二张只需输入票号后两位
#00341200           两张票号对应的航段序号
备注:
票联处以0000分别代表客票的换开票联
并以相应的数字代表需要换开的航段
用第一联来换             1000
用第二,三联来换          0230
用第一,二,三,四联来换    1234
data.requestSchema:
[{"name":"TES_AirOriginalIssueRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"手工换开请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码：PKE099）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"AirOriginalIssueInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"PNR","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR","children":[]},{"name":"Coupon","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"要换开的票联号 示例如： 换开第二联：0200 换开第一第三联：1030 换开连票号（共三连票，10航段）的所有航段：123412341200.","children":[]},{"name":"IssueCity","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"原出票城市.","children":[]},{"name":"IssueDate","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"原出票日期.","children":[]},{"name":"IssueOfficeIATA","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"原出票Office IATA号","children":[]},{"name":"OIType","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"默认 4；
1为ICS ET一般OI的输入 OI:[IN/](an)nn-nnnnnnnnnn#nnnn Pn 票号 tktno #coupon 旅客ID 
2 PTA 预订票款(PTA) 录入PTA的原票证号码 
3 PE PE换开 OI:PE/[IN/](an)nn-nnnnnnnnnn Pn 
4 CRS格式 OI:ET/[IN/](an)nn-nnnnnnnnn[-nn]#nnnn[nnnn] AAA DDMMMY nnnnnnnn Pn 票号 tktno #coupon 出票city 出票日（一位年） office（iatano表示） 旅客ID 
5 ES OI:ES/[IN/](an)nn-nnnnnnnnn[-nn]#nnnn[nnnn] AAA DDMMMY nnnnnnnn Pn","children":[]},{"name":"PassengerName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客姓名：旅客姓名是和pnr里的旅客姓名比对来计算pn的，与姓名组里的旅客一致，所以姓名组里是中文或英文都可以，如果是婴儿需输入对应的成人姓名而非婴儿姓名","children":[]},{"name":"SecondCoupon","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"第二原出票票联.联票使用Coupon和TktNo字段","children":[]},{"name":"SecondTktNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"用两张票/两张连票换开时的第二原出票票号.联票使用Coupon和TktNo字段","children":[]},{"name":"TktNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号，连票应当是连票号的形式 格式： 999-2201234567 999-2201234567-69.","children":[]},{"name":"InputCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"InputCode","children":[]},{"name":"@InfantInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"false","description":"婴儿标识","children":[]}]},{"name":"TPA_Extensions","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"EnvelopType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"封口方式","children":[]}]}]}]
